item.title: Climbing Essentials: My First Gear Kit
item.description: Item Date Cost (czk) Ocún Twist Quattro 22 Oct 2022 1247 La Sportiva Tarantula 05 Nov 2022 1833 Petzl GriGri 2019 05 Nov 2022 1877 Singing Rock Hector Triple 05 Nov 2022 352 Beal Karma 9,8mm 60m 05 Nov 2022 2587 Black Diamond Mojo Chalk Bag 08 Nov 2022 319 Simond Belaying Gloves 8249782 03 Dec 2022 599 Simond Goliath HMS Screwgate + BLC Carabiner 12 Dec 2022 289 Simond Rocky M Carabiner 12 Dec 2022 149 After a few weeks of climbing I realized that I cannot stop doing it.
